channel.title: Interactive Communication on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Interactive Communication on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Establishing Two-way Communication
item.description: Q: 1 Give us an example of a time when establishing two-way communication with an individual or group was especially challenging. Refer to AECL\Challenging_two_way_communication keywords: listen and take feedback,

item.title: Elicit Comments
item.description: It is important to be receptive to others' ideas and opinions. Tell us about a time when you had to elicit comments or feedback from another team member on an important issue.

item.title: Elicit Comments
item.description: Q: 2. It is important to be receptive to others' ideas and opinions. Tell us about a time when you had to elicit comments or feedback from another team member on an important issue. refer to AECL\Elicit_communication.
